column4: hey guyz...just downloaded pidgin...and executed the "./configure" command...and when i executed the the "make" command...this is what i get http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/57588/  ...i think it's some thing to do with the dependencies....although i might be wrong....can some one plz give me a hint or point me to the right direction...thnx
